title: Jio vs Airtel vs Vodafone vs Idea: 3GB daily data recharge plans compared with detailed offers
dc:creator: FE Online
content: To ease out the convoluted decision-making for the best packs, we have put the recharge packs that provide 3GB daily data and calling - with and without offers - from all the telcos to find out what suits you best.
